item.title: Cost of Using AI: Is Premium Worth It?
item.description: Human is overwhelmed by $60/month for three AI tools. Kai calculates ROI and break-even points. Vector explains when premium is worth it vs when free is enough. Recurse investigates subscription fatigue and marketing tactics. Learn practical cost optimization strategies.
item.content:encoded: <![CDATA[Is ChatGPT Plus worth $20/month? Should you pay for Claude Pro? Kai runs the numbers, Vector explains when premium is worth it, Recurse questions subscription fatigue. Learn when to pay for AI and when free tiers are enough.]]>
